content.question: An astronaut with mass <math alttext="M sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is within a satellite that orbits Earth at a height <math alttext="H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> above its surface. Earth has a mass <math alttext="M sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and radius <math alttext="R sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the gravitational force exerted on the astronaut by Earth?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub lowercase g equals, uppercase G times the fraction with numerator M sub E, M sub A, and denominator H squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>G</mi><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub lowercase g equals, uppercase G times the fraction with numerator M sub E, M sub A, and denominator R sub E squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>G</mi><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub lowercase g equals, uppercase G times the fraction with numerator M sub E, M sub A, and denominator, open parenthesis, R sub E, end sub, plus H, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>G</mi><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>)</mo><msup><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="F sub lowercase g equals, 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F sub lowercase g equals, uppercase G times the fraction with numerator M sub E, M sub A, and denominator, open parenthesis, R sub E, end sub, plus H, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>G</mi><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>H</mi><mo>)</mo><msup><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
